high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

Class AbstractTypeChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.AbstractAstVisitor
      • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.AbstractTypeChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAstVisitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpressionTypeChecker

    public abstract class AbstractTypeChecker
extends AbstractAstVisitor
    This class provides methods needed by all type-checkers.

      • findStaticField

        protected IField findStaticField(IExpression site,
                     TypeSpecifier type,
                     java.lang.String name)
        This method performs the resolution of a static-field.
        Parameters:
        site - is the site where the field is being used.
        type - is the type that contains the field.
        name - is the name of the field.
        Returns:
        the field that was found, or null, if no field was found.

      • findField

        protected IField findField(IExpression site,
               IExpression object,
               java.lang.String name)
        This method performs the resolution of an instance-field.
        Parameters:
        site - is the site where the field is being used.
        object - is the expression that produces the owner of the field.
        name - is the name of the field.
        Returns:
        the field that was found, or null, if no field was found.

      • checkAssign

        protected void checkAssign(IExpressionType target,
               IExpression expression)
        This method ensures that an expression is assignable to a particular type.

        This method takes into account boxing and unboxing.

        Parameters:
        target - is the type of the location where the value will be assigned.
        expression - is the expression that produces the value to assign.
